name: JAVA工程师
description: 职位描述【工作职责】参与带我飞业务系统设计和开发工作参与分布式系统服务化优化工作职位要求岗位要求：1年以上 java开发经验，主力参与互联网应用开发JAVA基础扎实，熟悉 Java8 ，熟悉 io 、多线程、集合等基础框架熟悉缓存、消息、搜索等机制，熟悉 redis ， zookeeper熟练使用 guava 、 spring 、 ibatis 等常用框架熟练使用 Unix/Linux，熟悉 MySQL/redis、zookeeper、lucene/elasticsearch等了解网络编程，熟悉 NIO/netty/Dubbo优先考虑：有技术博客，github有开源项目
raw_description:
职位描述

【工作职责】

  1. 参与带我飞业务系统设计和开发工作
  2. 参与分布式系统服务化优化工作

职位要求

岗位要求：

  1. 1年以上 java开发经验，主力参与互联网应用开发
  2. JAVA基础扎实，熟悉 Java8 ，熟悉 io 、多线程、集合等基础框架
  3. 熟悉缓存、消息、搜索等机制，熟悉 redis ， zookeeper
  4. 熟练使用 guava 、 spring 、 ibatis 等常用框架
  5. 熟练使用 Unix/Linux，熟悉 MySQL/redis、zookeeper、lucene/elasticsearch等
  6. 了解网络编程，熟悉 NIO/netty/Dubbo

优先考虑：有技术博客，github有开源项目

name: 前端架构师
description: 职位描述薪资15k起，上不封顶，欢迎大家投递简历负责Web前端架构设计，制定Web前端技术规范和标准，并督促所有实现按照规范和标准执行；负责产品易用性改进和Web前端技术优化，不断提升产品可用性、可访问性，优化用户体验；组建、管理Web前端工程师团队，规划Web前端技术方向，培养技术人才，带领团队提高。职位要求本科及以上学历，五年以上的前端领域开发经验，能独立完成前端开发工作；熟练掌握JavaScript，HTML，CSS开发，熟悉响应式布局；精通面向对象开发概念，具备学习和掌握新技术的能力；熟练运用主流的JS库和开发框架，如：React、Vue、Angular等；熟练使用前端编译打包工具，如Webpack, Gulp等；有代码洁癖，不能忍受垃圾代码。热爱技术，有极强的好奇心及持之以恒的钻研心态。
raw_description:
职位描述

薪资15k起，上不封顶，欢迎大家投递简历

  1. 负责Web前端架构设计，制定Web前端技术规范和标准，并督促所有实现按照规范和标准执行；
  2. 负责产品易用性改进和Web前端技术优化，不断提升产品可用性、可访问性，优化用户体验；
  3. 组建、管理Web前端工程师团队，规划Web前端技术方向，培养技术人才，带领团队提高。

职位要求

  1. 本科及以上学历，五年以上的前端领域开发经验，能独立完成前端开发工作；
  2. 熟练掌握JavaScript，HTML，CSS开发，熟悉响应式布局；
  3. 精通面向对象开发概念，具备学习和掌握新技术的能力；
  4. 熟练运用主流的JS库和开发框架，如：React、Vue、Angular等；
  5. 熟练使用前端编译打包工具，如Webpack, Gulp等；
  6. 有代码洁癖，不能忍受垃圾代码。热爱技术，有极强的好奇心及持之以恒的钻研心态。

name: 前端工程师

职位描述

1.前端工程师

级别：实习生、初级、中高级工程师

具体要求我就不写了，和大多数公司的要求一致。对于新人，面试过程会着重考察基础与学习能力；对于中、高级工程师，会着重考察技术沉淀或业务沉淀。

在线图像编辑器，涉及到 Canvas 操作相关

浏览器性能优化

熟悉 Node.js 或 PHP 开发以及常用框架，并了解其差异及适用场景

代码洁癖者
自带其他技能，不限于设计、交互、后端、客户端
写博客，或者 Github 有超过 100 Star 的开源项目
有 Canvas、WebGL 或者 WebAssembly 相关技术经验
学霸

前端团队目前有 18 人，有稀有的 Node.js 程序猿、性能优化狂热分子、Canvas 专家、Vim 信徒等、街舞爱好者、伪民谣歌手、伪设计师、伪摄影师等。

产品经理基本不（敢）变更需求，活儿干完了准点走
两周一次的前端技术分享会，生活委员会准备好一桌子的零食

我们使用

我们使用的工具大多是主流的开源项目，也会将自己开发的分支回馈到开源社区，如 Webpack 代码压缩的 parallel 与 cache 特性：uglifyjs-webpack-plugin/pull/77

name: Web Application Architect
description: 职位描述What you’ll be doing:•The NVIDIA Architecture group is looking for a web applications software engineer to develop the user interface and front end application for comprehensive workflows for the development of new graphics chips. •This software development team is a fast-paced agile software team with extremely high production quality standards producing tools used by engineering across the company for tracking and debugging operational and development issues.  •In this position, you will, in your ownership of full tool development and release life-cycle, drive the UI design, database interaction, development, testing, and deployment.•You will evaluate technology alternatives, work closely with other project members and customers to specify the system, create schedules, and manage ongoing feedback and enhancement releases.  •You will learn and greatly improve the daily workflows of the world’s top chip modelers and designers.职位要求What we need to see: •MS (preferred) or BS in Computer Science with at least 3 years of experience in developing web-based user interfaces and applications•Experience with databases required, MySQL or Postgress preferred, experience with NoSQL databases a plus.•Strong object-oriented programming background required: C++, Java or C# strongly preferred•Strong dynamic language skills desired – Perl or python preferred•Experience with .Net or Excel programming and the Excel Object Model a big plus
raw_description:
职位描述

What you’ll be doing:
•The NVIDIA Architecture group is looking for a web applications software engineer to develop the user interface and front end application for comprehensive workflows for the development of new graphics chips.
•This software development team is a fast-paced agile software team with extremely high production quality standards producing tools used by engineering across the company for tracking and debugging operational and development issues.
•In this position, you will, in your ownership of full tool development and release life-cycle, drive the UI design, database interaction, development, testing, and deployment.
•You will evaluate technology alternatives, work closely with other project members and customers to specify the system, create schedules, and manage ongoing feedback and enhancement releases.
•You will learn and greatly improve the daily workflows of the world’s top chip modelers and designers.

职位要求

What we need to see:
•MS (preferred) or BS in Computer Science with at least 3 years of experience in developing web-based user interfaces and applications
•Experience with databases required, MySQL or Postgress preferred, experience with NoSQL databases a plus.
•Strong object-oriented programming background required: C++, Java or C# strongly preferred
•Strong dynamic language skills desired – Perl or python preferred
•Experience with .Net or Excel programming and the Excel Object Model a big plus

name: 高级前端工程师

Introduce digital marketing tools to field sales & marketing team•    Manage and execute Website refresh for both Consumer and Enterprise Marketing•    Demonstrate knowledge of current and upcoming industry digital marketing platforms, standards and trends; benchmark NVIDIA performance against industry best practices•    Demonstrate knowledge of digital marketing in China, working with a cross-functional, multi-cultural marketing team•    Regular monitoring of SEO and web traffic metric. Analysis, reporting and updates as required职位要求What we need to see:•    Five or more years of experience in web development, web Server administration and project management•    Well-versed with front-end coding in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, with familiarity in various frameworks and template languages. REST APIs, JSON and XML•    Familiarity with Linux command line•    Knowledge of content caching and CDNs•    Strong understanding of Object-Oriented Programming, especially in PHP•    Proficient with database design, optimization, and tuning in My SQL•    Experience in design patterns, unit testing, automation and tuning in MYSQL•    Experience with Amazon Web Services (EC2, S3, EBS, RDS, SQS, Redshift, etc.)•    Exposure to collaborating tools like SVN, GitHub, JIRA, Confluence•    Experience with MVC Frameworks•    Experience in PHP frameworks such as Symfony 2, ZF2, or proven ability to learn on the job•    Exposure to SCRUM methodology, and XP technical practices such as unit testing, pair programming, test-driven development, continuous integration or continuous delivery•    Experience in mobile support, DOM, RWD and table-less markup•    Cross-browser compatibility and testing•    Strong design sense•    Solid knowledge of SEO, keyword research and Google/Adobe Analytics•    Experience with mobile platform and leveraging key Social media platforms in China such as Wechat and Weibo.•    Up-to-date with current technologies and trends in social media, design tools and applications•    China market experience a must
raw_description:
职位描述

What you’ll be doing:
• Work with the Global DMO as well as the China Field Marketing teams to implement and track Digital Marketing Office (DMO) projects aligned to the APJ DMO priorities
• Manage deployment and integration of new digital marketing platforms with strong change management. Introduce digital marketing tools to field sales & marketing team
• Manage and execute Website refresh for both Consumer and Enterprise Marketing
• Demonstrate knowledge of current and upcoming industry digital marketing platforms, standards and trends; benchmark NVIDIA performance against industry best practices
• Demonstrate knowledge of digital marketing in China, working with a cross-functional, multi-cultural marketing team
• Regular monitoring of SEO and web traffic metric. Analysis, reporting and updates as required

职位要求

What we need to see:
• Five or more years of experience in web development, web Server administration and project management
• Well-versed with front-end coding in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, with familiarity in various frameworks and template languages. REST APIs, JSON and XML
• Familiarity with Linux command line
• Knowledge of content caching and CDNs
• Strong understanding of Object-Oriented Programming, especially in PHP
• Proficient with database design, optimization, and tuning in My SQL
• Experience in design patterns, unit testing, automation and tuning in MYSQL
• Experience with Amazon Web Services (EC2, S3, EBS, RDS, SQS, Redshift, etc.)
• Exposure to collaborating tools like SVN, GitHub, JIRA, Confluence
• Experience with MVC Frameworks
• Experience in PHP frameworks such as Symfony 2, ZF2, or proven ability to learn on the job
• Exposure to SCRUM methodology, and XP technical practices such as unit testing, pair programming, test-driven development, continuous integration or continuous delivery
• Experience in mobile support, DOM, RWD and table-less markup
• Cross-browser compatibility and testing
• Strong design sense
• Solid knowledge of SEO, keyword research and Google/Adobe Analytics
• Experience with mobile platform and leveraging key Social media platforms in China such as Wechat and Weibo.
• Up-to-date with current technologies and trends in social media, design tools and applications
• China market experience a must
